response.original_title: 绿色包围 緑色包囲
response.overview: China's rapid economic development has led to serious environmental pollution. Against this backdrop, Tian Guirong is a middle-aged woman from a rural village who is passionate about environmental protection and devotes her life to collecting used dry cell batteries. The camera follows her and reveals the reactions of her husband and other people around her, as well as the depth of environmental problems in China...
response.title: Wrapped in Green
